title: FS/FT: Lot of Low Grade T206 w/ 22 HOF'ers  **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Lot of Low Grade T206 w/ 22 HOF'ers  **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale or trade.  As you can see by the scans, most of these are low grade cards, many with significant condition issues, and are priced accordingly.  

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free.  I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets.  I collect just about everything.  Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards for easier viewing):

Bresnahan (with bat), Piedmont - $23
Chase (dark cap, throwing) - $23
Tinker (hands on knees) - $23
Waddell (throwing), Piedmont (second Waddell pictured w/ paper loss on back and trimmed) - $25
Email sent on tinker bat off

Just a quick note for the new guys, I think Marc is one of the best guys on a board of great guys.  I have dealt with him on several occasions and can't say enough good thins about him.  Mark has been in large part responsible for my completion of both my T205 and T206 set and was the guy who really got me started on BST.

Chase pink
Marquard follow through
Tinker bat off
and snodgrass

I have dealt with him on several occasions and can't say enough good thins about him.  Mark has been in large part responsible for my completion of both my T205 and T206 set and was the guy who really got me started on BST.[/QUOTE]

I'll second that - Marc and I had a number of deals as we both worked on T207 - I think he needs only a couple of cards to finish out.  Always top notch and great to deal with.   Hi Marc!

Thanks to all who have replied with offers and purchases so far, and thanks especially to Todd and Mike for your kind words.  I have certainly enjoyed dealing with both of you (and countless others on the B/S/T) over the years and you guys have added much to my collection as well!
pm sent on sweet cap Marquard.
One bump for a price drop on all remaining cards...lots of HOF'ers left!  Thanks again to all who have responded.
